wizard_step1_caption1: Save here all your passwords, data or any information, forget paper notes and unprotected apps.
wizard_step1_caption2: Create your master key: only you can access your secrets with it.
como_funciona_desc: First you must create a different password for your electronic belongings. You will not be able to recover your password, so remember it well
que_guardar_desc: For example, your card number, the PIN and PUK of your mobile phone, the serial number of one of your devices or any information you need to have in a safe place.
wizard_step1_label: I am of legal age and I accept that my data be treated according to the privacy police.
wizard_step2_intro:
First, you must create a different password for your electronic belongings.
You will not be able to recover your password, so remember it well.
(Must contain 8 to 24 characters and at least 1 uppercase letter and 1 number)
wizard_step2_hint: You can also create a hint to help you remember your master password.
Crea tu pista para recordar tu contraseñ: Create your hint to remember your password (optional)
title_succes: Your Password Manager is now created!
msg_succes: A small congratulations message will appear here and I imagine some instructions
msg_error: We were unable to change your Master Password. Please try again later or contact us.
